item.description:
Gong Xi Fa Cai

Are you ready to celebrate the New Year again? Well, if you are join us at PF Chang's in the Prudential (NOT the Transportation Bldg) in the bar area on the ground level.
Intersecting streets are Huntington Avenue and Belvidere Street. Near Cheesecake Factory

This will be the first day of the Chinese New Year...what a good excuse to meetup.

Get there when you can and hang as long as you want.

The first new member who finds me and can tell me the animal sign for this year, gets a free drink.

Try their delicious ginger beer and tasty steamed dumplings.

PF Chang Prudential

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be seated at the high tables against windows. Gold star will on the table.
item.name: Happy New Year Again at the PRUDENTIAL PF Chang
